content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Hello Hassan, thank you for coming to see the apartment. I would be happy to discuss the rental price with you. Based on my market research, I believe that the apartment could be rented for a price of $2,000 per month. Is this within your budget?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: No, I am looking for a lower price. Do you have any other options available for me?
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: I apologize if my initial offer was not within your budget. Let me see if I can find any other options for you. In the meantime, can you tell me more about your needs and preferences for the apartment? For example, do you prefer a one-bedroom or a two-bedroom? Do you have any specific amenities that you are looking for? This information will help me to better understand your needs and find a suitable option for you.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I need a one-bedroom apartment. I don't require any specific amenities. I just need a safe and comfortable place to live. I am willing to negotiate on the rental price.

Thank you for your help.

I agree to the price of $1,800 per month.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Thank you for your understanding and willingness to negotiate. I am glad to hear that we have come to an agreement on the rental price. I am happy to assist you with the rental process and answer any questions you may have. Please let me know if you need any further assistance.
name: Heinrich Heine
